item.title: 【Zero Trust Isn't Just for Networks: Applying Zero-Trust Principles to CI/CD Pipelines】零信任不仅针对网络：将零信任原则应用于CI/CD管道
item.description:
【

Zero trust has emerged as a cornerstone of modern enterprise security. It is mainly applied to networks, user identities, and endpoints of most organizations. However, the single layer left undersecured is the CI/CD pipeline. These systems orchestrate code validation for production deployment and do so with persistent credentials and system privileges. This contradiction is fundamentally inconsistent with the rest of the zero-trust model, in which, by default, there should be no trust in any service, identity, or connection.

But in our environment, we realized that our pipelines had been quietly left out of security scrutiny. Jobs had long-lived secrets, and build containers were reused. The amount of access reached a level beyond what should be expected for any single job. We recognized these risks, and so we deemed that our pipelines should be treated as untrusted by default. This decision radically altered how we would approach automation and access.

】

零信任已成为现代企业安全的基石。它主要应用于大多数组织的网络，用户身份和端点。但是，剩下的单层是CI/CD管道。这些系统协调生产部署的代码验证，并具有持久的凭据和系统特权。这一矛盾在根本上与零值模型的其余部分不一致，默认情况下，任何服务，身份或连接都不应有信任。

，但是在我们的环境中，我们意识到我们的管道已被静静地排除在安全审查之外。乔布斯拥有长期的秘密，并重新使用了构建容器。访问量达到了一个水平，超出了任何一份工作的期望。我们认识到这些风险，因此我们认为我们的管道应被视为默认情况下不信任。该决定从根本上改变了我们将如何进行自动化和访问。

item.title: 【The Hidden Breach: Secrets Leaked Outside the Codebase Pose a Serious Threat】隐藏的违规：在代码库外泄漏的秘密构成了严重的威胁
item.description:
【

When you think of secrets scanning, most people immediately think about source code repositories on platforms like GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket. While the codebase is a source you absolutely should monitor, this is just a part of the overall secrets security story.

Indeed, secrets leaking in code are a major concern. In the GitGuardian’s 2025 State of Secrets Sprawl Report, the scale of this issue has surged dramatically. In 2024 alone, over 23.7 million new hardcoded secrets were added to public GitHub repositories — a 25% increase from the year before. And that’s just GitHub. 

】

当您想到秘密扫描时，大多数人会立即考虑Github，Gitlab和Bitbucket等平台上的源代码存储库。虽然代码库是您绝对应该监视的来源，但这只是整体秘密安全故事的一部分。

的确，秘密泄漏的秘密是一个主要问题。在超过2370万个新的硬编码秘密就被添加到公共GitHub存储库中 - 25％的增长 。那只是github。
